title.narrative: Technical Assistance & Capacity Building for Livelihood Empowerment Against Poverty

description.narrative: This activity (Technical Assistance & Capacity Building for Livelihood Empowerment Against Poverty) is a component of Livelihood Empowerment Against Poverty reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £1,411,331. This component benefits Ghana, and works in the following sector(s): Social Protection. , with the following implementing partners: Coffey International Development, Oxford Policy Management, PwC Ghana. The start date is 24-07-2012 and the end date is 31-12-2017.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
